documentation.text: @dev Emitted when the implementation is upgraded.
@dev Emitted when the beacon is upgraded.
@dev Emitted when the admin account has changed.

@dev Perform implementation upgrade
 Emits an {Upgraded} event.

@dev Perform implementation upgrade with additional setup call.
 Emits an {Upgraded} event.

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (bytes32) pure returns (struct StorageSlot.BooleanSlot storage pointer)

documentation.text:
@dev Perform implementation upgrade with security checks for UUPS proxies, and additional setup call.
 Emits an {Upgraded} event.

@dev Changes the admin of the proxy.
 Emits an {AdminChanged} event.

natspec.details: This abstract contract provides event emitting update functions for https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-1967[EIP1967] slots. _Available since v4.1._

AdminChanged(address,address).details: Emitted when the admin account has changed.

BeaconUpgraded(address).details: Emitted when the beacon is upgraded.

Upgraded(address).details: Emitted when the implementation is upgraded.
